price: 55 Ils dirent : « Es-tu sérieux ou en train de plaisanter ? »
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
